name: Potato Pistoleros
description:
In Potato Pistolero, you have to avoid the "hot potato subjects" by throwing potatoes at people who want you to talk about it. Your goal is to score as high as you can by aiming well. Have fun ;) You have 25s to play and then you can restart another game if you enjoyed ;)

A wood plank comes out ->Throw a potato at it !One light is out ->You have wasted 5s on the timer ! Throw a potatoAim and left click.

The game was created by Matteo Benaissa in 3 hours for the Trijam 88 with the theme Hot Potato. The cover art design is inspired from an Anonymous JP Magazine Cover of 1915.
